channel.title: CVE Feed for LY Corporation -- 'Yahoo! JAPAN' App for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LY Corporation -- 'Yahoo! JAPAN' App for Android

item.title: CVE-2024-28895|2024-04-01T00:16:08.562Z -- ly%20corporation -- %27yahoo%21%20japan%27%20app%20for%20android
item.description: 'Yahoo! JAPAN' App for Android v2.3.1 to v3.161.1 and 'Yahoo! JAPAN' App for iOS v3.2.2 to v4.109.0 contain a cross-site scripting vulnerability. If this vulnerability is exploited, an arbitrary script may be executed on the WebView of 'Yahoo! JAPAN' App via other app installed on the user's device.
